product.title: The Organic Cotton Boxer Brief in Black
product.body_html: Good underwear is the one you forget is there. Our boxers feature an elastic waistband and are as comfortable as they are ergonomic. Made from only the best organic cotton to keep you feeling at ease behind the scene, it also features a Rudolf SILVERPLUS® antimicrobial coating for added protection and freshness that lasts up to 25 domestic washes.
